definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
to trust/to entrust/to be entrusted with/to act as trustee

sentences.english: He also demanded that his followers commit themselves to him wholeheartedly.
sentences.chinese: 他也要求他的跟随者全心全意的把自己交托给他。

sentences.english: But He never worketh till we commit.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们不交托，神就不成全。

sentences.english: Casting our cares is a choice.
sentences.chinese: 交托我们的忧虑是自己的选择。

sentences.english: When you are being maligned falsely, don't retaliate. Leave it with Him.
sentences.chinese: 当你被人陷害时，不要报复，而是交托给主。

sentences.english: Dear Eugenie, I will leave it in your keeping.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的欧也妮，我把它交托给你。

sentences.english: I just cast myself on Your mercy.
sentences.chinese: 我把自己交托给你的怜悯。

sentences.english: It is surrendering yourself to that which is beyond yourself.
sentences.chinese: 那是把自己交托于比自己更高的东西。

sentences.english: Entrust your team to remain diligent in developing and implementing policy.
sentences.chinese: 把工作交托给你的团队继续用心制订政策并切实执行。

sentences.english: I want to commend my little brother to your care.
sentences.chinese: 我想把我的小弟弟交托给你照顾。

sentences.english: Can I just lay them down before Him and follow Him by faith?
sentences.chinese: 是否可以全然的交托，然后凭信心跟上去呢？

sentences.english: Souls are given over to the demons and their saraband.
sentences.chinese: 灵魂在缓慢而庄严的萨拉班德舞曲中交托给魔鬼。

sentences.english: I want to commend my little pother to your care.
sentences.chinese: 我想把我的小弟弟交托给你照顾。

sentences.english: And with whom did you leave those few sheep in the desert?
sentences.chinese: 在旷野的那几只羊，你交托了谁呢？

sentences.english: If I trust him with my life -- completely.
sentences.chinese: 我若将我的生命全然交托给神。

sentences.english: Evidently because they have not left their way with the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 很明显的是因为他们没有把他们的事交托主。

sentences.english: Is he not the God of Gentiles too?
sentences.chinese: 第一是神的圣言交托他们。

definition: to decide/to make decisions/to take responsibility (for deciding)/to be in charge/to give sb justice
to pass on to sb/to carry and give to sb else
